title: Fungible Compensatory Area/BUA shall be permissible over and above permissible FSI as per column no 7 of Table No
clause_text: Fungible Compensatory Area/BUA shall be permissible over and above permissible FSI as per column no 7 of Table No.12 above and as per the provisions of Regulation no 31(3).
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones

source_pdf.text_snippet: Fungible Compensatory Area/BUA shall be permissible over and above permissible FSI as per column no 7 of Table No.12 above and as per the provisions of Regulation no 31(3).
